Add Spotify audio analysis to a data frame

add_audio_analysis.Rd

Fetches and joins the Spotify audio analysis for every Spotify URI in a data frame.

add_audio_analysis(df, ...)

Arguments

df

A data frame with a track_uri column.
...

Parameters passed on to get_tidy_audio_analysis.

See also

get_tidy_audio_analysis

Examples

library(tidyverse)
#> ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ──
#> ✔ ggplot2 3.1.0       ✔ purrr   0.3.2  
#> ✔ tibble  2.1.1       ✔ dplyr   0.8.0.1
#> ✔ tidyr   0.8.3       ✔ stringr 1.4.0  
#> ✔ readr   1.3.1       ✔ forcats 0.4.0  
#> ── Conflicts ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
#> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
#> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
get_playlist_audio_features('spotify', '37i9dQZF1DX21bRPJuEN7r') %>%
    slice(1:5) %>%
    add_audio_analysis
#> # A tibble: 5 x 42
#>   playlist_name playlist_uri playlist_tracks… playlist_num_tr… snapshot_id
